message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $18,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm thinking $16,500 could work for both of us.
Alice, I really want to make this deal work, but my budget is limited to $12,000. I'm not going to be able to go any higher than that. Is there any way we can reach an agreement at that price?
I appreciate your honesty, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $17,000 to make this deal worthwhile for me.
